sqlMap.select: /* userGroup.totalCountUser */ SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM SECURITY_USER_GROUP A JOIN SECURITY_PRINCIPAL B ON A.USER_ID = B.PRINCIPAL_ID AND B.PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'U' WHERE 1=1 A.GROUP_ID=#groupId# B.SHORT_PATH LIKE #shortPathCond#||'%' B.PRINCIPAL_NAME LIKE #principalNameCond#||'%'
/* userGroup.exist */ SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM SECURITY_USER_GROUP WHERE USER_ID=#userId# AND GROUP_ID=#groupId#

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT A.USER_ID, A.GROUP_ID, B.SHORT_PATH, B.PRINCIPAL_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY $sortColumn$ $sortMethod$ ORDER BY SORT_ORDER ASC ) as rnum FROM SECURITY_USER_GROUP A JOIN SECURITY_PRINCIPAL B ON A.USER_ID = B.PRINCIPAL_ID AND B.PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'U' WHERE 1=1 A.GROUP_ID=#groupId# B.SHORT_PATH LIKE #shortPathCond#||'%' B.PRINCIPAL_NAME LIKE #principalNameCond#||'%' ) tb WHERE tb.rnum BETWEEN #startRow# AND #endRow#

/* userGroup.detailGroup */
SELECT a.GROUP_ID, a.USER_ID, b.SHORT_PATH, b.PRINCIPAL_NAME PRINCIPAL_NAME0, a.MILEAGE_TAG, a.SORT_ORDER,c.DOMAIN, c.DOMAIN_ID, d.DOMAIN_NM, a.EMP_NO, a.ORG_CD, b.PRINCIPAL_INFO01, b.PRINCIPAL_INFO02, b.PRINCIPAL_INFO03 FROM SECURITY_USER_GROUP a INNER JOIN SECURITY_PRINCIPAL b ON a.GROUP_ID=b.PRINCIPAL_ID, DOMAIN c, DOMAIN_LANG d WHERE 1=1 AND a.USER_ID=#userId# AND a.GROUP_ID=#groupId# AND b.DOMAIN_ID=c.DOMAIN_ID AND b.DOMAIN_ID=d.DOMAIN_ID AND d.LANG_KND=#langKnd#

/* userGroup.detailUser */
SELECT a.GROUP_ID, a.USER_ID, b.SHORT_PATH, b.PRINCIPAL_NAME PRINCIPAL_NAME0, a.MILEAGE_TAG, a.SORT_ORDER, c.DOMAIN, c.DOMAIN_ID, d.DOMAIN_NM, a.EMP_NO, a.ORG_CD, b.PRINCIPAL_INFO01, b.PRINCIPAL_INFO02, b.PRINCIPAL_INFO03 FROM SECURITY_USER_GROUP a INNER JOIN SECURITY_PRINCIPAL b ON a.USER_ID=b.PRINCIPAL_ID,DOMAIN c, DOMAIN_LANG d WHERE 1=1 AND a.USER_ID=#userId# AND a.GROUP_ID=#groupId# AND b.DOMAIN_ID = c.DOMAIN_ID AND b.DOMAIN_ID = d.DOMAIN_ID AND d.lang_knd = #langKnd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SECURITY_USER_GROUP ( GROUP_ID,USER_ID,MILEAGE_TAG,SORT_ORDER ) VALUES ( #groupId#,#userId#,'N',(SELECT count(USER_ID) FROM SECURITY_USER_GROUP WHERE USER_ID=#userId#) )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SECURITY_USER_GROUP SET GROUP_ID=#groupId#,USER_ID=#userId#,MILEAGE_TAG=#mileageTag#,SORT_ORDER=#sortOrder# WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID=#userId# AND GROUP_ID=#groupId#
